labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The auto-scroll only goes up to one channel below where the mention is
data.expected_result: The channel list should auto-scroll up to the channel where the mention is
data.short_description: When clicking on the "New mentions" sign in red, the auto-scroll won't go all the way up to the channel where the mention is
data.steps_to_repro: - Be mentioned on any channel that's located more upwards and needs scroll to be seen - Click the "New Mentions" button
